Turn the Tide.description: 每场战斗一次，当你选择孤注一掷，你可以从你的敌人那里夺回主动权并进行一次行动（不能是进度行动）。当你这样做时，在成功时加+1并获得+1的气势。如果你在那个行动中未能成功，你必须承受一个可怕的结果。付出代价。
Turn the Tide.title: 逆转局势

End the Fight.title: 结束战斗
End the Fight.strong: 若为强成功，这个敌人不再参与战斗了。他们会被杀死、失去行动能力、逃亡或投降，这要根据情况和你的意图而定(如果不确定，询问先知).
End the Fight.miss: 若为失败，你已经输掉了这场战斗。付出代价。
End the Fight.weak:
若为弱成功，同上，但你也必须选择一项。

  • 这比你想象的还要糟糕：忍受伤害。
  • 你被打惨了：忍受压力。
  • 你的胜利是短暂的：一个新的危险或敌人出现了，或者现有的危险变得更加糟糕了。
  • 你遭受附带损伤：有价值的东西丢失或损坏，或有重要的人必须付出代价。
  • You’ll pay for it: An objective falls out of reach.
  • 其他人不会忘记：你会被人找上门来寻仇。
End the Fight.description: 当你进行了一个决定性的行动并获得强成功时, 并取得强成功时，你可以尝试结算这场战斗的结果。如果你这样做了，请投挑战骰，并与你的进度相比较。在该投骰中，这次掷骰无视气势。

Endure Harm.description: 当你 face physical damage, suffer -health equal to your foe’s rank or as appropriate to the situation. If your health is 0, suffer -momentum equal to any remaining -health. Then，投+health or +钢铁, whichever is higher.
Endure Harm.strong:
若为强成功，选择一项。

  • Shake it off: If your health is greater than 0, suffer -1 momentum in exchange for +1 health.
  • Embrace the pain: 获得+1气势。
Endure Harm.title: 忍耐伤害

Endure Harm.entry1: The harm is mortal. 直面死亡。
Endure Harm.entry2: You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or 直面死亡。
Endure Harm.entry3: You are unconscious 并out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, 直面死亡。
Endure Harm.entry4: You are reeling 并fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
Endure Harm.entry5: You are battered but still standing.

Endure Harm.miss:
若为失败, also suffer -1 momentum. If you are at 0 health, 你必须mark wounded or maimed (if currently unmarked) or roll on the following table.

Roll Result
1-10 The harm is mortal. 直面死亡。
11-20 You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or Face Death.
21-35 You are unconscious 并out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, 直面死亡。
36-50 You are reeling 并fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
51-00 You are battered but still standing.

Face Danger.strong: 若为强成功，你成功了，获得+1气势。
Face Danger.title: 直面危险
Face Danger.description:
当你试图进行危险行为或是应对迫在眉睫的危机时，设想你的行动然后投骰，如果你的行动基于……

  • 速度，敏捷，或精准：投+锋锐。
  • 魅力，忠诚，或勇气：投+心灵。
  • 侵略性的行为，强而有力的防御，力量，或者耐力：投+钢铁。
  • 欺瞒，隐匿，或诡诈：投+阴影。
  • 专业知识，洞悉，或观察：投+机智。
Face Danger.weak:
若为弱成功，你成功了，但还面临着令人不悦的代价。选择一项。

  • 你被拖住了，失去优势，或者面临新的威胁：失去-1气势。
  • 你累了，或着受伤了：忍受伤害（1点伤害）。
  • 你陷入沮丧或者担忧之中：忍受压力（1点压力）。
  • 你消耗了资源：失去-1补给。
Face Danger.miss: 若为失败，你失败了，或者你的进展被一个戏剧性的、代价高昂的事件所破坏。付出代价。

Secure An Advantage.title: 获取优势
Secure An Advantage.description:
当你评估状况，进行准备工作，或试图占得先机，设想你的行动然后投骰。如果你的行动基于……

  • 速度，敏捷，或精准：投+锋锐.
  • 魅力，忠诚，或勇气：投+心灵.
  • 侵略行为，强而有力的防御，力量，或者耐力：投+钢铁.
  • 欺瞒，隐匿，或诡诈：投+暗影.
  • 专业知识，洞悉，或观察：投+机智。
Secure An Advantage.weak: 若为弱成功，你的优势来得相当短暂。获得+1气势。
Secure An Advantage.miss: 若为失败，你失败了，或者你的设想并没有成真。付出代价。
Secure An Advantage.strong:
若为强成功，你获取了优势，选择一项。

  • 掌控局面：立刻进行另一个行动（不能是进度行动）并获得+1。
  • 蓄势待发：获取+2气势。

Heal.title: 疗伤
Heal.strong: 若为强成功，你的照顾很有效。如果你（或受你照顾的盟友）有重伤状态，你可以清除它。然后，获得或给予最多+2的健康。
Heal.weak: 若为弱成功，同上，但你必须承受-1补给或-1气势（你选择）。
Heal.miss: 若为失败，你的援助无效。付出代价。付出代价。
Heal.description: 当你治疗受伤或疾病时，投+机智。如果你是在治疗自己的伤口，请投+机智或+钢铁，以较低者为准。

Resupply.title: 获取补给
Resupply.description: 当你打猎、觅食、或搜刮时，投+机智。
Resupply.strong: 若为强成功，你夯实了自己的的物资。获得+2补给。
Resupply.weak: 若为弱成功，最多获得+2的补给，但每获得一点都要承受-1气势。
Resupply.miss: 若为失败，你没有找到任何有用的东西。付出代价。

Make Camp.title: 扎营
Make Camp.description: 当你在野外休息和恢复数小时，投+补给。
Make Camp.strong: 若为强成功，你和你的盟友可以各自选择两个。
Make Camp.miss: 若为失败，你没有得到休息。付出代价。
Make Camp.weak:
若为弱成功，选择一项。

  • 休息：让你和你的同伴获得+1健康。
  • 分享：失去-1补给，并为你和任何同伴获得+1健康。
  • 放松：获得+1精神。
  • 集中：获得+1气势。
  • 准备：当你离开营地时，如果你进行旅行，则获得+1。

Undertake a Journey.title: 进行旅行
Undertake a Journey.description:
当你在危险或不熟悉的地方旅行时，设定你的旅程等级。

  • 麻烦的旅程：每个节点3个进度。
  • 危险的旅程：每个节点2个进度。
  • 可怕的旅程：每个节点1个进度。
  • 极端的旅程：每个节点2划。
  • 史诗的旅程：每个节点1划。

然后，对于你的每段旅程，投+机智。如果你从一个与你有纽带的社区出发，则加上你的初始骰点+1。
Undertake a Journey.strong:
若为强成功，你到达一个节点。如果你不知道这个节点，请设想一下 (如果不确定，询问先知). 然后，选择一项。

  • 你很好地利用了你的资源。标记进度。
  • 快速移动：标记进度并取得+1气势，但失去-1补给。
Undertake a Journey.weak: 若为弱成功，你到达一个节点并标记进度，但失去-1补给。
Undertake a Journey.miss: 若为失败，你被一个危险的事件所阻挡。付出代价。

Reach Your Destination.description: 当你的 journey comes to an end, roll the challenge dice 并compare to your progress.这次掷骰无视气势。
Reach Your Destination.strong:
若为强成功, the situation at your destination favors you. Choose one.

  • Make another move now（不能是进度行动），并获得+1。
  • 获得+1气势。
Reach Your Destination.weak: 若为弱成功, you arrive but face an unforeseen hazard or complication.想象你发现了什么（如果不确定，询问先知）。
Reach Your Destination.title: 到达目的地
Reach Your Destination.miss: 若为失败, you have gone hopelessly astray, your objective is lost to you, or you were misled about your destination. If your journey continues, clear all but one filled progress, 并raise the journey’s rank by one (if not already epic).

Compel.title: 操控
Compel.description:
当你 attempt to persuade someone to do something, envision your approach 并roll. If you...

  • Charm, pacify, barter, or convince:投+心灵 (add +1 if you share a bond).
  • Threaten or incite:投+钢铁.
  • Lie or swindle:投+暗影.
Compel.strong: 若为强成功, they’ll do what you want or share what they know. 获得+1气势。 If you use this exchange to Gather Information, make that move now 并add +1.
Compel.weak: 若为弱成功, as above, but they ask something of you in return. Envision what they want (如果不确定，询问先知).
Compel.miss: 若为失败, they refuse or make a dem并which costs you greatly. 付出代价。

Sojourn.title: 旅居
Sojourn.description: 当你 spend time in a community seeking assistance，投+心灵.如果你们共享一个纽带，获得+1。
Sojourn.weak:
若为弱成功, you 并your allies may each choose one from within the categories below. If you share a bond, choose one more.

Clear a Condition

  • Mend: Clear a wounded debility 并take +1 health.
  • 心灵en: Clear a shaken debility 并获得+1精神。
  • Equip: Clear an unprepared debility and获得+1补给。

Recover

  • Recuperate: Take +2 health for yourself 并any companions.
  • Consort: Take +2 spirit.
  • Provision:获得+2补给。
  • Plan: 获得+2气势。

Provide Aid

  • Take a quest: Envision what this community needs, or what trouble it is facing (如果不确定，询问先知). If you chose to help, 发下铁誓 并add +1.
Sojourn.miss: 若为失败, you find no help here. 付出代价。
Sojourn.extradescription: 若为hit, you 并your allies may each focus on one of your chosen recover actions and投+心灵 again.如果你们共享一个纽带，获得+1。
Sojourn.strong:
On 强成功, you 并your allies may each choose two from within the categories below. If you share a bond, choose one more.

Clear a Condition

  • Mend: Clear a wounded debility 并take +1 health.
  • 心灵en: Clear a shaken debility 并获得+1精神。
  • Equip: Clear an unprepared debility and获得+1补给。

Recover

  • Recuperate: Take +2 health for yourself 并any companions.
  • Consort: Take +2 spirit.
  • Provision:获得+2补给。
  • Plan: 获得+2气势。

Provide Aid

  • Take a quest: Envision what this community needs, or what trouble it is facing (如果不确定，询问先知). If you chose to help, 发下铁誓 并add +1.
Sojourn.extrastrong: 若为强成功, take +2 more for that action.
Sojourn.extramiss: 若为失败, it goes badly 并you lose all benefits for that action.

Forge a Bond.weak: 若为弱成功, they ask something more of you first. Envision what it is (如果不确定，询问先知), do it (or 发下铁誓), 并mark the bond. If you refuse or fail, 付出代价。
Forge a Bond.miss: 若为失败, they reject you. 付出代价。
Forge a Bond.title: 缔结纽带
Forge a Bond.description: 当你 spend significant time with a person or community, st并together to face hardships, or make sacrifices for their cause, you can attempt to create a bond. 当你 do，投+心灵. If you make this move after you successfully Fulfill Your Vow to their benefit, you may reroll any dice.
Forge a Bond.strong:
若为强成功, make note of the bond, mark a tick on your bond progress track, 并选择一项。

  • 获得+1精神。
  • 获得+2气势。

Test Your Bond.title: 考验纽带
Test Your Bond.description: 当你的 bond is tested through conflict, betrayal, or circumstance，投+心灵.
Test Your Bond.strong:
若为强成功, this test has strengthened your bond. Choose one.

  • 获得+1精神。
  • 获得+2气势。
Test Your Bond.weak: 若为弱成功, your bond is fragile 并且你必须prove your loyalty. Envision what they ask of you (如果不确定，询问先知), 并do it (or 发下铁誓). If you refuse or fail, clear the bond 并付出代价。
Test Your Bond.miss: 若为失败, or if you have no interest in maintaining this relationship, clear the bond 并付出代价。

Aid Your Ally.title: 援助盟友
Aid Your Ally.description: 当你 获取优势 in direct support of an ally，并获得hit, they (instead of you) can take the benefits of the move. If you are in combat 并score a 强成功, you 并your ally have initiative.

Clash.title: 交锋
Clash.description: 当你的敌人拥有主动权并且你在近距离与其作战，投+钢铁。当你在射程内互相射击，或向前进中的敌人射击时，投+锋锐。
Clash.strong:
若为强成功造成伤害并选择一项。你获得主动权。

  • 你巩固了当前的位置：获得+1气势。
  • 你找到一个破绽：造成+1伤害。
Clash.weak: 若为弱成功，造成你的伤害，但随后付出代价。你的敌人拥有主动权。
Clash.miss: 若为失败，你不敌对手，必须付出代价。你的敌人拥有主动权。

Battle.title: 混战
Battle.description:
当你参与战斗, 但其细节并不重要时，设想你的目标，然后投骰。 如果你主要进行......

  • 远距离战斗，或利用你的速度和地形的优势。投骰+锋锐。
  • 依靠你的勇气、盟友或同伴作战。掷骰子+心灵。
  • 近身搏斗，压倒对手。投骰+钢铁。
  • 使用诡计来迷惑对手的战斗。投骰+阴影。
  • 使用小心翼翼的战术来胜过对手。掷骰子+机智。
Battle.strong: 若为强成功，毫无疑问，你实现了目标。获得+2气势。
Battle.weak: 若为弱成功，你实现了目标，但并非没有代价。付出代价。
Battle.miss: 若为失败，你被击败，失去了目标。付出代价。

Face Death.title: 直面死亡
Face Death.description: 当你 are brought to the brink of death, 并glimpse the world beyond，投+心灵.
Face Death.strong: 若为强成功, death rejects you. You are cast back into the mortal world.
Face Death.weak:
若为弱成功，选择一项。

  • You die, but not before making a noble sacrifice. Envision your final moments.
  • Death desires something of you in exchange for your life. Envision what it wants (如果不确定，询问先知), 并发下铁誓 (formidable or extreme) to complete that quest. If you fail to score a hit when you 发下铁誓, or refuse the quest, you are dead. Otherwise, you return to the mortal world 并are now cursed. You may only clear the cursed debility by completing the quest.

Companion Endure Harm.miss: 若为失败, also suffer -1 momentum. If your companion’s health is 0, they are gravely wounded 并out of action. Without aid, they die in an hour or two. If you roll a miss with a 1 on your action die, 并your companion’s health is 0, they are now dead. Take 1 experience for each marked ability on your companion asset, 并remove it.
Companion Endure Harm.title: 伙伴忍受伤害
Companion Endure Harm.description: 当你的 companion faces physical damage, they suffer -health equal to the amount of harm inflicted. If your companion’s health is 0, exchange any leftover -health for -momentum. Then，投+心灵 or +your companion’s health, whichever is higher.
Companion Endure Harm.strong: 若为强成功, your companion rallies. Give them +1 health.
Companion Endure Harm.weak: 若为弱成功, your companion is battered. If their health is 0, they cannot assist you until they gain at least +1 health.

Endure Stress.title: 忍受压力

Endure Stress.entry2: You give up. Forsake Your Vow (if possible, one relevant to your current crisis).
Endure Stress.entry3: You give in to a fear or compulsion, 并act against your better instincts.

Endure Stress.miss:
若为失败, also suffer -1 momentum. If you are at 0 spirit, 你必须mark shaken or corrupted (if currently unmarked) or roll on the following table.

Roll Result
1-10 You are overwhelmed. Face Desolation.
11-25 You give up. Forsake Your Vow (if possible, one relevant to your current crisis).
26-50 You give in to a fear or compulsion, 并act against your better instincts.
51-00 You persevere.
Endure Stress.description: 当你 face mental shock or despair, suffer -spirit equal to your foe’s rank or as appropriate to the situation. If your spirit is 0, suffer -momentum equal to any remaining -spirit. Then，投+spirit or +心灵, whichever is higher.
Endure Stress.strong:
若为强成功，选择一项。

  • Shake it off: If your spirit is greater than 0, suffer -1 momentum in exchange for +1 spirit
  • Embrace the darkness: Take +1 momentum

Face Desolation.title: 直面绝望
Face Desolation.description: 当你 are brought to the brink of desolation，投+心灵.
Face Desolation.strong: 若为强成功, you resist 并press on.
Face Desolation.weak:
若为弱成功，选择一项。

  • Your spirit or sanity breaks, but not before you make a noble sacrifice. Envision your final moments.
  • You see a vision of a dreaded event coming to pass. Envision that dark future (如果不确定，询问先知), 并发下铁誓 (formidable or extreme) to prevent it. If you fail to score a hit when you 发下铁誓, or refuse the quest, you are lost. Otherwise, you return to your senses 并are now tormented. You may only clear the tormented debility by completing the quest.
Face Desolation.miss: 若为失败, you succumb to despair or horror 并are lost.

Out of Supply.title: 耗尽补给
Out of Supply.description: 当你的 supply is exhausted (reduced to 0), mark unprepared. If you suffer additional -supply while unprepared, 你必须exchange each additional -supply for any combination of -health, -spirit or -momentum as appropriate to the circumstances.

Face a Setback.title: 直面挫折
Face a Setback.description:
当你的 momentum is at its minimum (-6), 并you suffer additional -momentum，选择一项。

  • Exchange each additional -momentum for any combination of -health, -spirit, or -supply as appropriate to the circumstances.
  • Envision an event or discovery (如果不确定，询问先知) which undermines your progress in a current quest, journey or fight. Then, for each additional -momentum, clear 1 unit of progress on that track per its rank (troublesome=clear 3 progress; dangerous=clear 2 progress; formidable=clear 1 progress; extreme=clear 2 ticks; epic=clear 1 tick).

Fulfill Your Vow.miss:
若为失败, your quest is undone. Envision what happens (如果不确定，询问先知), 并选择一项。

  • You recommit: Clear all but one filled progress, 并raise the quest’s rank by one (if not already epic).
  • You give up: Forsake Your Vow.
Fulfill Your Vow.title: 实现誓言
Fulfill Your Vow.description: 当你 achieve what you believe to be the fulfillment of your vow, roll the challenge dice 并compare to your progress.这次掷骰无视气势。
Fulfill Your Vow.strong: 若为强成功, your quest is complete. Mark experience (troublesome=1; dangerous=2; formidable=3; extreme=4; epic=5).
Fulfill Your Vow.weak: 若为弱成功, there is more to be done or you realize the truth of your quest. 想一下你发现了什么(如果不确定，询问先知). Then, mark experience (troublesome=0; dangerous=1; formidable=2; extreme=3; epic=4). You may 发下铁誓 to set things right. If you do, add +1.

Forsake Your Vow.title: 放弃誓言
Forsake Your Vow.description: 当你 renounce your quest, betray your promise, or the goal is lost to you, clear the vow 并Endure Stress. You suffer -spirit equal to the rank of your quest (troublesome=1; dangerous=2; formidable=3; extreme=4; epic=5). If the vow was made to a person or community with whom you share a bond, Test Your Bond when you next meet.

Advance.title: 提升
Advance.description: 当你 focus on your skills, receive training, find inspiration, earn a reward, or gain a companion, you may spend 3 experience to add a new asset, or 2 experience to upgrade an asset.

Pay the Price.title: 付出代价

Pay the Price.entry2: A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you.
Pay the Price.entry3: A person or community you care about is exposed to danger.
Pay the Price.entry4: You are separated from something or someone.
Pay the Price.entry5: Your action has an unintended effect.
Pay the Price.entry14: It forces you to act against your best intentions.
Pay the Price.entry1: Roll again 并apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (Ask the Oracle if unsure) 并make it happen.
Pay the Price.entry16: Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.
Pay the Price.entry6: Something of value is lost or destroyed.
Pay the Price.entry8: A new danger or foe is revealed.
Pay the Price.entry9: It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage.
Pay the Price.entry12: A surprising development complicates your quest.
Pay the Price.entry15: A friend, companion, or ally is put in harm’s way (or you are, if alone).

Pay the Price.description:
当你 suffer the outcome of a move，选择一项。

  • Make the most obvious negative outcome happen.
  • Envision two negative outcomes. Rate one as ‘likely’, 并询问先知 using the yes/no table. 若为‘yes’, make that outcome happen. Otherwise, make it the other.
  • Roll on the following table. If you have difficulty interpreting the result to fit the current situation, roll again.
Roll Result
1-2 Roll again 并apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (如果不确定，询问先知) 并make it happen.
3-5 A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you.
6-9 A person or community you care about is exposed to danger.
10-16 You are separated from something or someone.
17-23 Your action has an unintended effect.
24-32 Something of value is lost or destroyed.
33-41 The current situation worsens.
42-50 A new danger or foe is revealed.
51-59 It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage.
60-68 It is harmful.
69-76 It is stressful.
77-85 A surprising development complicates your quest.
86-90 It wastes resources.
91-94 It forces you to act against your best intentions.
95-98 A friend, companion, or ally is put in harm’s way (or you are, if alone).
99-00 Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.

Ask the Oracle.title: 询问先知
Ask the Oracle.description:
当你 seek to resolve questions, discover details in the world, determine how other characters respond, or trigger encounters or events, you may...

  • Draw a conclusion: Decide the answer based on the most interesting 并obvious result.
  • Ask a yes/no question: Decide the odds of a ‘yes’, 并roll on the table below to check the answer.
  • Pick two: Envision two options. Rate one as ‘likely’, 并roll on the table below to see if it is true. If not, it is the other.
  • Spark an idea: Brainstorm or use a random prompt.
Odds The answer is ‘yes’ if you roll...
Almost Certain 11 or greater
Likely 26 or greater
50/50 51 or greater
Unlikely 76 or greater
Small Chance 91 or greater

Discover a Site.title: Discover a Site
Discover a Site.description:
当你 resolve to enter a perilous site in pursuit of an objective, choose the theme 并domain which best represent its nature (如果不确定，询问先知), 并give it a rank.

  • Troublesome site: 3 progress per area.
  • Dangerous site: 2 progress per area.
  • Formidable site: 1 progress per area.
  • Extreme site: 2 ticks per area.
  • Epic site: 1 tick per area.

If you are returning to a previously explored site, roll both challenge dice, take the lowest value, 并clear that number of progress boxes.

Then, Delve the Depths to explore this place.

Delve the Depths.title: Delve the Depths
Delve the Depths.strong: 若为强成功, you delve deeper. Mark progress 并Find an Opportunity.

Delve the Depths - Edge.entry3: Choose one: Mark progress or Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Edge.entry4: Take both: Mark progress 并Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Edge.entry5: Mark progress twice 并Reveal a Danger.

Delve the Depths - Shadow.entry3: Choose one: Mark progress or Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Shadow.entry4: Take both: Mark progress 并Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Shadow.entry5: Mark progress twice 并Reveal a Danger.

Delve the Depths - Wits.entry3: Choose one: Mark progress or Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Wits.entry4: Take both: Mark progress 并Find an Opportunity.
Delve the Depths - Wits.entry5: Mark progress twice 并Reveal a Danger.

Delve the Depths.description:
当你traverse an area within a perilous site, envision your surroundings (如果不确定，询问先知). Then, consider your approach. If you navigate this area...

  • With haste:投+锋锐.
  • With stealth or trickery:投+暗影.
  • With observation, intuition, or expertise:投+机智。
Delve the Depths.weak:
若为弱成功, roll on the following table according to your stat.

Edge Shadow Wits 弱成功 Result
1-45 1-30 1-40 Mark progress 并Reveal a Danger.
46-65 31-65 41-55 Mark progress.
66-75 66-90 56-80 Choose one: Mark progress or Find an Opportunity.
76-80 91-99 81-99 Take both: Mark progress 并Find an Opportunity.
81-00 00 00 Mark progress twice 并Reveal a Danger.

Find an Opportunity.title: Find an Opportunity
Find an Opportunity.description:
当你 encounter a helpful situation or feature within a site, roll on the following table. If you are making this move as a result of a 强成功 on Delve the Depths, you may pick or envision an opportunity instead of rolling.

Then，选择一项。

  • Gain insight or prepare: 获得+1气势。
  • Take action now: You 并any allies may make a move (not a progress move) which directly leverages the opportunity. 当你 do, add +1 并take +1 momentum 若为你.
Roll Result
1-25 The terrain favors you, or you find a hidden path.
26-45 An aspect of the history or nature of this place is revealed.
46-57 You locate a secure area.
58-68 A clue offers insight or direction.
69-78 You get the drop 若为denizen.
79-86 This area provides an opportunity to scavenge, forage, or hunt.
87-90 You locate an interesting or helpful object.
91-94 You are alerted to a potential threat.
95-98 You encounter a denizen who might support you.
99-00 You encounter a denizen in need of help.

Find an Opportunity.entry1: The terrain favors you, or you find a hidden path.
Find an Opportunity.entry2: An aspect of the history or nature of this place is revealed.
Find an Opportunity.entry4: A clue offers insight or direction.
Find an Opportunity.entry5: You get the drop 若为denizen.
Find an Opportunity.entry6: This area provides an opportunity to scavenge, forage, or hunt.
Find an Opportunity.entry7: You locate an interesting or helpful object.
Find an Opportunity.entry8: You are alerted to a potential threat.
Find an Opportunity.entry9: You encounter a denizen who might support you.
Find an Opportunity.entry10: You encounter a denizen in need of help.

Escape the Depths.weak:
若为弱成功, you find your way out, but this place exacts its price. Choose one.

  • You are weary or wounded: Endure Harm.
  • The experience leaves you shaken: Endure Stress.
  • You are delayed, 并it costs you.
  • You leave behind something important.
  • You face a new complication as you emerge from the depths.
  • A denizen plots their revenge.
Escape the Depths.title: Escape the Depths
Escape the Depths.description:
当你 flee or withdraw from a site, consider the situation 并your approach. If you...

  • Find the fastest way out:投+锋锐.
  • Steel yourself against the horrors of this place:投+心灵.
  • Fight your way out:投+钢铁.
  • Retrace your steps or locate an alternate path:投+机智。
  • Keep out of sight:投+暗影.
Escape the Depths.strong: 若为强成功, you make your way safely out of the site. 获得+1气势。
Escape the Depths.miss: 若为失败, a dire threat or imposing obstacle stands in your way. Reveal a Danger. If you survive, you may make your escape.

Mark Your Failure.title: Mark Your Failure
Mark Your Failure.description: 当你 make a move 并score a miss, mark a tick on your failure track. If 你 score a miss when making a progress move, mark two ticks.

Take a Hiatus.title: Take a Hiatus
Take a Hiatus.description:
当你 spend an extended time recovering in a safe place while a threat is active, do any of the following.

  • Clear any marked conditions.
  • Set your health, spirit, supply, 并companion health to their maximum values.
  • Set your momentum to its reset value.

Then, for each active threat, Advance a Threat.

Gather Information.title: 获取信息
Gather Information.description: 当你搜索一个区域，问问题，进行调查，或跟踪一道线索时，投+机智。如果你所行动的社区或者你所提问的人与你有着纽带，则你获得+1。
Gather Information.strong: 若为强成功，你发现了一些有用的、具体的东西。你必须遵循的路径或你必须获得的行动才能取得进展，这一点很明确。想一下你发现了什么(如果不确定，询问先知), 并获得+2气势。
Gather Information.weak: 若为弱成功，该信息使你的探索变得复杂，或者引入了新的危险。想一下你发现了什么(如果不确定，询问先知), 并获得+1气势。
Gather Information.miss: 若为失败, 你的调查发现了一个可怕的威胁或揭示了一个不受欢迎的真相，这可能破坏了你的行动。付出代价。

Swear an Iron Vow.title: 发下铁誓
Swear an Iron Vow.weak: 若为弱成功, you are determined but begin your quest with more questions than answers. Take +1 momentum, 并envision what you do to find a path forward.
Swear an Iron Vow.miss:
若为失败, you face a significant obstacle before you can begin your quest. Envision what stands in your way (如果不确定，询问先知), 并选择一项。

  • You press on: Suffer -2 momentum, 并do what 你必须to overcome this obstacle.
  • You give up: Forsake Your Vow.
Swear an Iron Vow.description: 当你 swear upon iron to complete a quest, write your vow 并give the quest a rank. Then，投+心灵. If you make this vow to a person or community with whom you share a bond, add +1.
Swear an Iron Vow.strong: 若为强成功, you are emboldened 并it is clear what 你必须do next (如果不确定，询问先知). 获得+2气势。

Reach a Milestone.title: 抵达里程碑
Reach a Milestone.description:
当你 make significant progress in your quest by overcoming a critical obstacle, completing a perilous journey, solving a complex mystery, defeating a powerful threat, gaining vital support, or acquiring a crucial item, you may mark progress.

  • Troublesome quest: Mark 3 progress.
  • Dangerous quest: Mark 2 progress.
  • Formidable quest: Mark 1 progress.
  • Extreme quest: Mark 2 ticks.
  • Epic quest: Mark 1 tick.

Reveal a Danger.entry7: You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach.
Reveal a Danger.entry8: Your way is blocked or trapped.
Reveal a Danger.entry9: A resource is diminished, broken, or lost.
Reveal a Danger.entry10: You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice.
Reveal a Danger.entry11: You lose your way or are delayed.
Reveal a Danger.entry12: Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.
Reveal a Danger.entry4: You face an environmental or architectural hazard.
Reveal a Danger.entry5: A discovery undermines or complicates your quest.
Reveal a Danger.entry6: You confront a harrowing situation or sensation.

Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry2: You face an environmental or architectural hazard.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry3: A discovery undermines or complicates your quest.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry4: You confront a harrowing situation or sensation.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry5: You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry6: The path is blocked or trapped.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry7: A resource is diminished, broken, or lost.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry8: You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry9: You lose your way or are delayed.
Reveal a Danger Alternate.entry10: Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.

Reveal a Danger.title: Reveal a Danger
Reveal a Danger.description:
当你 encounter a risky situation within a site, envision the danger or roll on the following table.

Roll Result
1-30 Check the theme card.
31-45 Check the domain card.
46-57 You encounter a hostile denizen.
58-68 You face an environmental or arc你ectural hazard.
69-76 A discovery undermines or complicates your quest.
77-79 You confront a harrowing situation or sensation.
80-82 You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach.
83-85 Your way is blocked or trapped.
86-88 A resource is diminished, broken, or lost.
89-91 You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice.
92-94 You lose your way or are delayed.
95-00 Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.

Check Your Gear.title: Check Your Gear
Check Your Gear.description: 当你 check to see if you have a specific helpful item, 并you have at least +1 supply，投+补给。
Check Your Gear.strong: 若为强成功, you have it. 获得+1气势。
Check Your Gear.weak: 若为弱成功, you have it, but your resources are diminished. Take +1 momentum 并遭受-1补给。
Check Your Gear.miss: 若为失败, you don’t have it 并the situation grows more perilous. 付出代价。

Locate Your Objective.title: Locate Your Objective
Locate Your Objective.description: 当你的 exploration of a site comes to an end, roll the challenge dice 并compare to your progress.这次掷骰无视气势。
Locate Your Objective.strong:
若为强成功, you locate your objective 并the situation favors you. Choose one.

  • Make another move now (not a progress move)，并获得+1。
  • 获得+1气势。
Locate Your Objective.weak: 若为弱成功, you locate your objective but face an unforeseen hazard or complication. Envision what you find (Ask the Oracle if unsure).
Locate Your Objective.miss: 若为失败, your objective falls out of reach, you have been misled about the nature of your objective, or you discover that this site holds unexpected depths. If you continue your exploration, clear all but one filled progress 并raise the site’s rank by one (if not already epic).

Reveal a Danger (alternate version).title: Reveal a Danger (alternate version)
Reveal a Danger (alternate version).description:
当你 encounter a risky situation within a site, envision the danger or roll on the following table.

Roll Result
1-22 You encounter a hostile denizen.
23-42 You face an environmental or architectural hazard.
43-58 A discovery undermines or complicates your quest.
59-64 You confront a harrowing situation or sensation.
65-70 You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach.
71-76 The path is blocked or trapped.
77-82 A resource is diminished, broken, or lost.
83-88 You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice.
89-94 You lose your way or are delayed.
95-00 Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.

Wield a Rarity.title: Wield a Rarity
Wield a Rarity.description:
When you make a move aided by an augmented asset, roll your rarity die in place of your action die.

On any result with 6 showing on the rarity die, the power of the rarity manifests in a dramatic 并obvious way. You score an automatic 强成功 并获得+1气势。

若为成功 with 5 showing on the rarity die, the power of the rarity manifests in a subtle way. 获得+1气势。

若为miss with 1 showing on the rarity die, the rarity’s power fails or works against you.

Draw the Circle.title: 决斗
Draw the Circle.description: 当你 challenge someone to a formal duel, or accept a challenge，投+心灵. If you share a bond with this community, add +1.
Draw the Circle.strong: 若为强成功, 获得+1气势。 You may also choose up to two boasts 并take +1 momentum for each.
Draw the Circle.weak:
若为弱成功, you may choose one boast in exchange for +1 momentum.

  • Grant first strike:你的敌人拥有主动权。
  • Bare yourself: Take no benefit of armor or shield; your foe’s harm is +1.
  • Hold no iron: Take no benefit of weapons; your harm is 1.
  • Bloody yourself: Endure Harm (1 harm).
  • To the death: One way or another, this fight must end with death.
Draw the Circle.miss: 若为失败, you begin the duel at a disadvantage.你的敌人拥有主动权。 付出代价。 Then, make moves to resolve the fight. If you are the victor, you may make a lawful demand, 并your opponent must comply or forfeit their honor 并standing. If you refuse the challenge, surrender, or are defeated, they make a dem并of you.

Write Your Epilogue.title: 写下终章
Write Your Epilogue.description: 当你 retire from your life as Ironsworn, envision two things: What you hope for, 并what you fear. Then, roll the challenge dice 并compare to your bonds.这次掷骰无视气势。
Write Your Epilogue.strong: 若为强成功, things come to pass as you hoped.
Write Your Epilogue.weak: 若为弱成功, your life takes an unexpected turn, but not necessarily for the worse. You find yourself spending your days with someone or in a place you did not foresee. Envision it (如果不确定，询问先知).
Write Your Epilogue.miss: 若为失败, your fears are realized.

Enter the Fray.title: 进入战斗
Enter the Fray.description:
当你你进入战斗时，为每个敌人设置一个等级。

  • Troublesome foe: 3 progress per harm; inflicts 1 harm.
  • Dangerous foe: 2 progress per harm; inflicts 2 harm.
  • Formidable foe: 1 progress per harm; inflicts 3 harm.
  • Extreme foe: 2 ticks per harm; inflicts 4 harm.
  • Epic foe: 1 tick per harm; inflicts 5 harm.

Then, roll to determine who is in control. If you are...

  • Facing off against your foe:投+心灵.
  • Moving into position against an unaware foe, or striking without warning:投+暗影.
  • Ambushed:投+机智。
Enter the Fray.strong: 若为强成功, 获得+2气势。你获得主动权。
Enter the Fray.weak:
若为弱成功，选择一项。

  • Bolster your position: 获得+2气势。
  • Prepare to act: Take initiative.
Enter the Fray.miss: 若为失败, combat begins with you at a disadvantage. 付出代价。你的敌人拥有主动权。

Strike.title: 猛攻
Strike.description: 当你拥有主动权并且在近距离发起进攻，投+钢铁。当你拥有主动权并发起远距离进攻，投+锋锐。
Strike.strong: 若为强成功，造成+1伤害。你保留主动权。
Strike.weak: 若为弱成功，造成伤害并失去主动权。
Strike.miss: 若为失败，你的攻击失败，并且你必须付出代价。你的敌人拥有主动权。

Learn From Your Failures.title: Learn From Your Failures
Learn From Your Failures.description: 当你 spend time reflecting on your hardships 并missteps, 并your failure track is +6 or greater, roll your challenge dice 并compare to your progress.这次掷骰无视气势。
Learn From Your Failures.strong:
若为强成功, you commit to making a dramatic change. Take 3 experience 并clear all progress. Then，选择一项。

  • Adjust your approach: Discard a single asset, 并take 2 experience for each marked ability.
  • Make an oath: 发下铁誓, 并reroll any dice.
  • Ready your next steps: Take +3 momentum.
Learn From Your Failures.weak: 若为弱成功, you learn from your mistakes. Take 2 experience 并clear all progress.
Learn From Your Failures.miss: 若为失败, you’ve learned the wrong lessons. Take 1 experience 并clear all progress. Then, envision how you set off on an ill-fated path.

Advance a Threat.title: Advance a Threat
Advance a Threat.description:
当你 give ground to a threat through inaction, failure, or delay, roll on the table below 并envision how the change manifests in your world (如果不确定，询问先知).

Roll Result
1-30 The threat readies its next step, or a new danger looms. If you are in a position to prevent this development, you may attempt to do so. If you succeed, Reach a Milestone. Otherwise, mark menace.
31-70 The threat works subtly to advance toward its goal, or the danger escalates. Mark menace.
71-00 The threat makes a dramatic 并immediate move, or a major event reveals new complications. Mark menace twice.

若为match, this development also exposes a surprising aspect of the threat’s plan or nature.

If 你 mark the last box on the threat’s menace track, the threat achieves its goal, or the final dire outcome occurs. You must Forsake Your Vow.

Advance a Threat.entry1: The threat readies its next step, or a new danger looms. If you are in a position to prevent this development, you may attempt to do so. If you succeed, Reach a Milestone. Otherwise, mark menace.
Advance a Threat.entry2: The threat works subtly to advance toward its goal, or the danger escalates. Mark menace.
Advance a Threat.entry3: The threat makes a dramatic 并immediate move, or a major event reveals new complications. Mark menace twice.

Barrow.description:
In this cruel land, there is no shortage of dead to be put to rest. Some barrows are simple crypts for a family or steading. Others are more elaborate or extensive, plunging well into the depths of the earth. A few inconspicuous mounds, their rock 并earth worn by time, mark an entryway into impossibly labyrinthine tombs built by long-forgotten people.

Even the most ancient of these sites still echo with the memory 并power of lives once lived, battles once fought, loves gained or lost, 并vows unfulfilled.
Barrow.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Barrow.feature12: You transition into a new domain
Barrow.title: Barrow

Cavern.title: Cavern
Cavern.description:
Another world lies beneath our feet. Caverns vein the Ironlands with meandering tunnels, plunging pits, soaring chambers, 并absolute darkness. Claustrophobic crawlspaces 并crevices may lead to miles-long cave complexes. Underground waterways carve a relentless path through stone.

当你 enter these sites, you are a trespasser in a hostile domain. What unseen things dwell here, watching 并waiting, amidst the depths?
Cavern.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Cavern.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Frozen Cavern.title: Frozen Cavern
Frozen Cavern.summary: A place of deep caves 并enduring cold.
Frozen Cavern.feature12: You transition into a new domain
Frozen Cavern.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Frozen Cavern.description:
These maze-like tunnels are found in the most inhospitable northern reaches of the Ironlands—carved through glacier, mountain, 并hill—or in places of supernatural cold. Their icy depths are a perilous environment of fracturing terrain, shadowy reflections, hollow echoes, 并lurking predators.

Entering a frozen cavern is like delving into another world. There is a stark beauty in the icebound passages 并glistening chambers. Amazing discoveries, locked in the ice, lie unseen for millennia. But do not be distracted by those enticements. The hazards of this site have no sympathy for the unwary 并ill-prepared.

Icereach.feature12: You transition into a new domain
Icereach.title: Icereach
Icereach.summary: A frigid landscape formed of frozen seas.
Icereach.description:
An Icereach is an expanse of frozen sea, blue-white 并sprawling in all directions. These sites are typically found in the northernmost waters. However, a few vast icereaches— kept perpetually frozen by forces we do not understand—clog the seas in southern regions.

Only the cruelest, most powerful creatures can survive here. The terrain is rugged 并cut-through with unstable ice 并frigid waterways. Food is scarce. Bitter winds blast the landscape. The remains of ships, locked within the ice, st并as monuments to those who braved these places 并were forever lost.
Icereach.feature11: You transition into a new theme

Mine.title: Mine
Mine.description:
Within the earth, riches await the bold. Some mines are shallow pits worked by pick 并shovel. Others are offshoots of existing caverns which pierce deep into hills 并mountains. A few are the remains of vast underground complexes built by forgotten cultures.

The iron 并other metals claimed from these sites feed our furnaces. From those fires, we craft tools, armor, weapons, 并other precious goods. Our hunger for these resources is never satiated, 并we often dig into places best left undisturbed.
Mine.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Mine.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Pass.title: Pass
Pass.description:
Winding through highlands 并mountain ranges, these sites offer a tempting route over otherwise impassable terrain. But treacherous landscapes, foul weather, 并a host of mountain predators offer their own dangers. Raiders 并others take advantage of these natural chokepoints to ambush the unwary.

Lonely cairns mark the resting places of those who walked these routes undefended or unprepared. Pray that your path here does not end under a pile of mountain stones.
Pass.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Pass.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Ruin.title: Ruin
Ruin.summary: The crumbling legacy of a dead civilization.
Ruin.description:
These decaying edifices, skeletal 并shadowed, mark the remains of once-great communities 并civilizations. Some of these sites have been newly adapted by Ironlanders as shelter, temple, or citadel. Others are home only to dangerous creatures 并dark forces.

Newly discovered ruins tempt bold explorers with the promise of powerful legacies 并forgotten secrets. But most see these places as a portent of our inescapable, grim fate in these lands. Someday, another people may delve into the ruins of what we leave behind.
Ruin.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Ruin.feature12: You transition into a new domain
Ruin.danger4: Unstable floor above a new danger

Sea Cave.summary: Stone passages carved by ocean waves.
Sea Cave.description:
Carved by ocean waves 并unyielding currents, the sea caves pockmarking the coasts plunge deep into the land’s dark 心灵. Deadly creatures or determined foes often lair within, but it is the water that is your ever-present enemy. The chill 并damp seep into your bones. The tides 并upl并flooding can bring a torrent of water with little warning. You plunge desperately through submerged passages, praying that an opening will provide a pocket of air.

This is a realm of water 并stone, cold 并darkness. You are not welcome here.
Sea Cave.title: Sea Cave
Sea Cave.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Sea Cave.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Shadowfen.title: Shadowfen
Shadowfen.summary: A primeval marsh, cloaked in mist.
Shadowfen.feature1: Narrow path through a fetid bog
Shadowfen.description:
These foul sites are cloaked in mist, clogged with muddy peat, 并drenched in fetid water. Thickets of gray, skeletal trees conceal stalking creatures. Strange shapes move in the fog 并beneath dark, placid water. Narrow trails tease with the promise of passage, but instead lead to hidden quagmires.

Be wary. 当你 enter a shadowfen, the specter of death is your constant companion.
Shadowfen.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Shadowfen.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Tanglewood.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Tanglewood.title: Tanglewood
Tanglewood.summary: A perilous forest of eternal shadow.
Tanglewood.description:
A tanglewood is a thick wilderness, shrouded in mist. Overhanging, twisted boughs obscure the sky. The ground is snarled with exposed roots. The wind carries foreboding whispers, 并branches rattle like old bones.

Many refuse to harvest wood from these places, believing the spirits who reside within will bring a curse upon them 并their families. Others fear the creatures 并beings which lurk within. For these reasons, even near settled areas, the tangles still stand.
Tanglewood.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Underkeep.title: Underkeep
Underkeep.description:
These subterranean structures are a mystery. They are inexplicably ancient, older perhaps than even the Firstborn. Their passages 并halls hide dangers within unfathomable darkness.

Most Ironlanders stay well clear of these places. But some stumble upon the entrance to an underkeep 并delve inside, drawn by its secrets or the alluring promise of forgotten power. Others, desperate for protection from the perils of the surface world, foolishly try to use the depths of an underkeep as a sanctum for their kin or clan. They soon discover that the greatest threats lie beneath.
Underkeep.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Underkeep.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Stronghold.title: Stronghold
Stronghold.description: These sites weather storms 并sieges alike. Their walls st并firm against the forces of this dark land. They are fortified against attack 并rife with guards, traps, 并other defenses. For those who dwell within, strongholds provide the comfort of wood 并stone, axe 并bow. For those who seek to breach the walls, they can be as unyielding 并unforgiving as the most stalwart ironbound shield.
Stronghold.feature11: You transition into a new theme
Stronghold.feature12: You transition into a new domain

Theme.Name: 视觉主题
Theme.Hint: 选择游戏的视觉效果。需要重启。

SharedSupply.Name: 共享补给条
SharedSupply.Hint: 如果开启，改变任何角色共享补给追踪条也会改变所有其他角色的补给。

LogChanges.Name: 记录角色更新
LogChanges.Hint: 如果开启，角色属性的变化将被记录在聊天记录中。

PromptTruths.Name: 世界事实弹窗
PromptTruths.Hint: 如果没有这么做，在开始时用对话框弹出生成世界事实。

Corrupted.title: Corrupted
Corrupted.summary: This place is tainted by dark magic.
Corrupted.description:
A corrupted site is befouled by dark forces. It might be the ancient magic of the Ironlands, or the residue of ancient evils, concentrated here like poisoned water soaked into a sponge. Perhaps a powerful mystic dwells in this place, one who walks a sinister path in search of power.

当你 enter a corrupted site, you can feel the wrongness of it down to your bones. The air is tainted with foul smells, or tinged with strange energies. You hear unintelligible whispers. Shadows lurk at the edge of your vision. The creatures of this place are twisted by corruption, 并the people are in thrall to a dark influence.
Corrupted.danger11: Lingering effects of a dark ritual
Corrupted.danger12: Dread harbingers of a greater magic

Fortified.title: Fortified
Fortified.summary: Foes defend this place against intruders.
Fortified.description:
A fortified site is held 并defended by an enemy force. It might be an enemy camp, an outpost, a fortress, or a closely-guarded territory.

Infiltrating this place requires caution 并cunning. You may be forced to avoid inhabitants, sentries, 并patrols. Revealing yourself or causing a disturbance will catch the attention of the denizens, perhaps forcing you to fight your way to your objective.
Fortified.danger3: Denizen ready to sound the alarm
Fortified.danger5: Denizen lures you into a trap

Hallowed.title: Hallowed
Hallowed.danger8: Aspect of the faith beguiles you
Hallowed.description:
A hallowed site is a place of great reverence, suffused with the power of old gods or the fervency of belief. It might be a location of religious significance, the resting place of legendary relics or figures, or the haven of a religious leader.

Hallowed places may be warded by ancient rituals, or imbued with divine energy. But it is the faithful 并the zealous who will sacrifice everything to defend this place.
Hallowed.danger2: Denizen enacts the will of their god
Hallowed.danger4: Secret of the faith is revealed
Hallowed.danger10: Embodiment of a god or myth

Haunted.danger9: The environment is used against you
Haunted.danger11: True nature of this place is revealed
Haunted.title: Haunted
Haunted.summary: Restless spirits are bound to this place.
Haunted.description:
Within a haunted site, dread, sadness, 并fear are palpable. Disturbing sounds 并visions lure the unwary 并terrorize the vulnerable. Gird your will when you enter this place, for you walk at the boundary of life 并death.

Some lost souls, unaware they have passed, wander the site in search of answers. Others, stricken by eternal grief, seek to set right what caused their death or see their vows fulfilled. But all too often, the denizens of this place are undone by their deaths. They are rage 并terror made incarnate, feeling nothing but hate for the living 并a hunger for warmth which will never be sated.
Haunted.feature5: Apparitions of a person or event
Haunted.danger5: Denizen seizes your body or mind

Infested.title: Infested
Infested.description:
Foul creatures swarm these sites, overwhelming trespassers with sheer numbers 并unchecked ferocity. The denizens do little beyond multiplying, feeding, 并expanding, ravenous for fresh kills to feed the swarm.

Navigation through this place, across paths undermined by the hordes, may be perilous. The sights 并smells may test your fortitude. But it is the creatures which pose the greatest threat, as they ambush 并cut off your escape with unforeseen cunning.
Infested.danger6: Denizen guided by a greater threat
Infested.danger8: Denizen funnels you down a new path

Ancient.title: Ancient
Ancient.summary: This place holds the secrets of a bygone age.
Ancient.description:
An ancient site contains the mysteries, legacies, 并dangers of another age.

Walking the paths of this place is like stepping through time. Ruins 并relics provide glimpses of long-forgotten people 并events. The knowledge 并power hidden here are a tempting lure, but those treasures may come with a dire cost. Some secrets are best left buried.
Ancient.feature5: Visions of this place in another time
Ancient.danger6: Living relics of a lost age
Ancient.danger8: Dire warnings of a long-buried danger
Ancient.danger10: Artifact of terrible meaning or power

Ravaged.title: Ravaged
Ravaged.summary: Time, disaster, or strife have taken their toll.
Ravaged.description:
Time, weather, war, or calamity have laid waste to a ravaged site. The terrain is precarious. Hazards lurk around every corner. You may face glimpses of a former greatness, but this place is a ruined shadow of what it once was.

Traversing a ravaged site requires care, cunning, 并quick wits to react to sudden perils. The environment here is your greatest enemy. It is a force, as willful as any intelligent adversary, which will see your quest undone.

Wild.title: Wild
Wild.description:
Despite our attempts to extend our control into untracked reaches, the primal forces of nature still hold sway across the Ironlands. In those wild places, we must test our shields against tooth 并claw, our wits against insidious creatures, 并our resolve against dangerous terrain 并harsh environments.

Be wary when you enter the wild places of this world. Beyond the comforting walls of your village, you are not the hunter. You are the prey.
Wild.danger5: Denizen guided by a greater threat
Wild.danger11: Disturbing evidence of a victim’s fate

Legacies.option1: 我们是第一批行走在这片土地上的人类。
Legacies.name: 传承
Legacies.quest1: 第一批定居者的记录中有一段描诉着深山荒野中心地带的一片小树林。据说这个地方的精魂会赐予一种神奇的祝福。它究竟赐予了什么恩惠？
Legacies.option2: 天气很糟糕。风雨从海洋中席卷而来。这里的冬天漫长而严酷。第一批定居者中有人抱怨说：“只有铁做的人才敢住在这个该死的地方”——我们的土地因此而得名。
Legacies.quest2: 收获不足。无情的大雪使村庄与世隔绝。食物即将耗尽。你要怎么做才能让这些人度过这个恶劣的季节？
Legacies.option3: 在这片土地上，到处都有令人难以置信的金属柱。它们呈铁灰色，像河底的鹅卵石一样光滑。没有人知道它们的用途。有人说它们和世界一样古老。有些人，如铁祭司，还会崇拜它们，并在它们面前立下誓言。大多数人在遇到它们的时候，都会做出保佑的手势，然后匆匆赶路。这些柱子不会褪色，即使是最锋利的刀剑也无法划伤它们。
Legacies.quest3: 你的梦中出现了这些柱子的幻象，它矗立在一个陌生的地方。你看到了什么？为什么你发誓要寻找它？

Communities.name: 聚落
Communities.option3: 我们已将铁原打造成自己的家园。庇护所内的村庄被完善的道路所连接。贸易商队来往于避难所和外围地区的定居点之间。即便如此，这片土地上的大部分地区仍未被驯服。
Communities.option1: 在这片被诅咒的土地上，我们的人数很少。大多数人很少与我们自己的小农庄或村庄以外的人接触，而陌生人则被深深怀疑。
Communities.quest1: 在寒冷的冬天，一个绝望的人来到了一个雪地上的大棚。他受伤了，饿了，几乎被冻死。他的家人被带走了。被谁带走了？你会冒着无情的冬天去救他们吗？
Communities.option2: 我们生活在被称为环社的社区中。这些定居点的规模从几户人家的小木屋到几百人的村庄不等。有些环社属于游牧民。一些强大的圈子可能包括一个定居点群。我们与其他环社进行贸易（有时也有仇）。
Communities.quest2: 两个环社之间长达数十年的争斗已经演变成公开冲突。这个争端的原因是什么？你是加入这场斗争，还是发誓要制止它？
Communities.quest3: 商队被迫支付贸易道路上的通行费。这笔钱是所运货物的四分之一，使一些聚落无法获得足够的冬季物资。谁在提出这些要求？你将如何解决这个问题？

Leaders.name: 领袖
Leaders.option1: 这里的领导方式和这里的人民一样多种多样的。有些社区由一个有权势的家族的族长所管理。有的社区通过长老会作出决议、解决争端。在其他地方，祭司们掌握着权力。对有些人来说，则是由面对面里的决斗来解决问题。
Leaders.quest1: 你有一个活灵活现、不断出现的关于铁原上的一座城市的梦境。它有坚固的石墙，熙熙攘攘的市场，还有一座位于高山上的城堡。还有那么多的人! 在铁原的任何地方都没有这样一座城市。在你的梦中，你是这座城市的统治者。无论如何，无论花多长时间，你都必须把这个愿景变成现实。
Leaders.option2: 我们每个社区都有自己的领袖，称为监督者。每隔七个春天，人们会继续选择他们目前的监督者，或另换一个新的。一些监督员不情愿地戴上铁环，而另一些监督员则通过阴谋或威胁渴求获得权力。
Leaders.quest2: 一位监督者生病了。如果没有帮助，她必死无疑，而村里的医师也无法诊断她的病情。人们怀疑是毒药，甚至可能是邪恶的魔法。社区里的家族们现在都开始争权夺利，因为他们都在想让自己喜欢的候选人获得铁环。你能发现监督员患病的真相，并使她恢复健康吗？
Leaders.option3: 众多的部族首领统治着小规模的领地。大多数人都想成为真正的国王。他们的争吵将招致我们的毁灭。
Leaders.quest3: 你秘密拥有旧世界遗物——真王冠的二分之一。几个世纪前，当一个刺客的斧头劈开最高统治者的头时，这顶王冠被劈成两半。你是那个家族的后代。谁给了你这个遗物？你会找到断裂王冠的另一半，并试图在你的统治下统一各部族吗？或者，你会认为它有其他用途吗？

Defense.option1: 在铁原地区，物资太过珍贵，土地上的人口太过稀少，无法支持起有组织的战斗力量。当一个社区受到威胁时，人们会团结起来保护自己的家园。
Defense.quest1: 一个定居点无法或不愿意保护自己免受迫在眉睫的威胁。为什么？他们面临什么危险？你会做什么来保护他们？
Defense.name: 防御
Defense.option2: 哨兵是我们的士兵、卫兵和民兵。他们为自己的社区服务，站岗放哨，巡逻周围的土地，并在危机时刻组织防御。大多数人与他们的社区有着密切的联系。还有一些人被称为自由哨兵，他们是流浪的雇佣兵，受雇为社区服务或保护商队。
Defense.quest2: 你遇到了一个垂死的哨兵。她告诉你一个重要的任务，并要求你完成这个任务。她说：'向我发誓。'她伸出带血的手，给你一个对于此任务至关重要的东西。这会是什么？
Defense.option3: 我们的战队被召集起来，以打击我们的敌人或保卫我们的领地。虽然不像曾经在旧世界中征战的军队那样令人印象深刻，但这些部队的训练和装备都是他们社区可以管理的。战队的旗帜上装饰着他们在旧世界的历史和铁原的胜利的描述。
Defense.quest3: 一个战队在与压倒性的敌人的战斗中被消灭了。你和这个军团有什么关系？谁打败了他们？你会带着他们的旗帜去复仇，还是发誓要把旗帜带回家，让它成为一个荣耀的地方？

Firstborn.option2: 先民们生活在与世隔绝的环境中，对自己的土地有着强烈的保护欲。
Firstborn.name: 先民
Firstborn.option1: 先民已经变成了传说。有些人说旧部落的残余仍然居住在深山老林或高山上。大多数人认为他们从来都只是神话。
Firstborn.quest1: 有人痴迷于先民，想要找到他们存在的证据。这就需要对铁原的远方进行考察。你在这个任务中的角色是什么？
Firstborn.quest2: 这个被同类抛弃的精灵，与铁民生活在一起。随着时间的推移，他成为社区的一部分。现在，他快要死了。他渴望在去世前回到他的人民身边。他是在寻求赦免还是正义？你为什么发誓要帮助他？什么力量着反对他的回归？
Firstborn.option3: 先民掌握着铁原的控制权。森林深处的精灵和山丘上的巨人容忍我们的存在，甚至与我们进行贸易——至少目前是这样。铁民害怕着他们决定不再欢迎我们的那一天。
Firstborn.quest3: 人类和巨人正处于战争的边缘。发生了什么事？你站在哪一边？有什么办法可以化解这种局面吗？

Horrors.name: 恐怖之物
Horrors.option1: 不过是吓唬孩子的故事罢了。
Horrors.quest1: 谋杀案始于上个季度。当地的流言蜚语表明它们是一个复仇的恐怖存在所为，但可能有更多的世俗力量在发挥作用。你与这些杀人事件有什么关系？你将获得什么措施来阻止他们？
Horrors.option2: 我们对黑暗的森林和深邃的水道保持警惕，因为怪物潜伏其中。长夜漫漫，当万物都笼罩在黑暗之中时，只有傻瓜才会冒险离开自己的家园。
Horrors.quest2: 你身上有被恐怖袭击的伤痕。那是什么？这些疤痕是身体上的、情感上的，还是两者都有？你要如何让自己再次变完整？
Horrors.option3: 死者在铁原不会安息。在夜晚，我们点燃火把，撒上盐，在门边警惕。但这还不够，他们就要来了。
Horrors.quest3: 一群铁民在一个被邪恶的恐怖所诅咒的地区建立了一个定居点。是什么邪恶在困扰着这片土地？为什么铁民这么想在这里定居？你会帮助他们，还是试图迫使他们放弃这个愚蠢的计划？

The Old World.name: 旧世界
The Old World.option1: 被称为斯库尔德人的蛮族部落入侵了旧世界的各个王国。我们的军队被击垮。大多数人要么被杀要么沦为奴隶。那些逃亡者搭乘着任何可以漂浮的东西出海。经过长达数月的艰辛航行，幸存者们在铁原上登陆了。
The Old World.quest1: 你是斯库尔德人的后裔。由于你的血统，你的家族长期以来一直受到铁民的怀疑。现在，一小队斯库尔德人在海岸上登陆了。他们是入侵的预兆吗？你的忠诚又属于谁？
The Old World.option2: 一种疾病像可怕的浪潮一样席卷了旧世界，杀死了沿途的所有人。成千上万的人乘船逃亡。然而，瘟疫是跑不掉的。许多船通过无情的手段控制了疾病——任何表现出轻微症状的人都会被扔下船。有些船则永远消失了。最后，那些幸存下来的人找到了铁原，并把它作为自己的新家。有人说，我们将永远被那些受到遗弃之人所诅咒。
The Old World.quest2: 一个定居点被疾病所困扰着。虽然这种疾病与旧世界的瘟疫有一些相似之处，但它并没有杀死受害者。相反，它转化了他们。这种疾病是如何表现出来的？你为什么发誓要寻找治疗之法？
The Old World.quest3: 数十年前，移民潮结束了。从那时起，没有船只从旧世界航行到这里，直到现在。有消息称，有一艘新到的船穿过广阔的海洋，停在了屏障群岛的礁石旁。当你听到这艘船的名字时，你发誓要揭开其上乘客的命运。为什么它对你如此重要？
The Old World.option3: 旧世界无法再维系我们。我们的数量太多。我们砍光了森林。我们的庄稼在贫瘠的土地上枯萎。城市和村庄里充斥着绝望、饥饿的人们。渺小的国王们为争夺残羹剩饭而争斗着。我们把自己的命运交给了大海，并找到了铁原。一个新的世界。一个新的开始。

Iron.name: 铁
Iron.option1: 铁原那巍峨的丘陵和山脉中蕴藏着丰富的铁矿。其中最珍贵的是星铸黑铁。
Iron.quest1: 前往遥远的南地的商队在上个季节离开了采矿点，但从未抵达目的地。它携带了大量的黑铁。为什么找到这个丢失的商队对你如此重要？
Iron.option2: 天气很糟糕。风雨从海洋中席卷而来。这里的冬天漫长而严酷。第一批定居者中有人抱怨说：“只有铁做的人才敢住在这个该死的地方”——我们的土地因此而得名。
Iron.quest2: 收获不足。无情的大雪使村庄与世隔绝。食物即将耗尽。你要怎么做才能让这些人度过这个恶劣的季节？
Iron.option3: 在这片土地上，到处都有令人难以置信的金属柱。它们呈铁灰色，像河底的鹅卵石一样光滑。没有人知道它们的用途。有人说它们和世界一样古老。有些人，如铁祭司，还会崇拜它们，并在它们面前立下誓言。大多数人在遇到它们的时候，都会做出保佑的手势，然后匆匆赶路。这些柱子不会褪色，即使是最锋利的刀剑也无法划伤它们。
Iron.quest3: 你的梦中出现了这些柱子的幻象，它矗立在一个陌生的地方。你看到了什么？为什么你发誓要寻找它？

Religion.name: 宗教
Religion.option1: 少数铁民出于习惯或传统，仍然会打手势或喃喃自语地祈祷，但大多数人认为神灵早已抛弃了我们。
Religion.quest1: 一个富有魅力的铁民鼓励她的追随者放弃旧世界宗教的残余，为这个新世界开辟一条新的道路。她传播的是什么学说？她要实现什么目标？你是否发誓要帮助或阻止她？
Religion.option2: 人们敬重旧神和新神。在这片严酷的土地上，祈祷是一种简单而有力的安慰。
Religion.quest2: 一个铁民决心到危险的地方去朝圣。他们要寻找什么圣地？你为什么发誓要帮助他们完成这次旅行？谁想阻止他们，为什么？
Religion.option3: 我们的神灵有很多。他们通过显灵和神迹使自己出名。有人说他们甚至秘密地行走在我们中间。祭司们传达着神的意志，并掌握着许多社区的命运。
Religion.quest3: 你有一个神明的印记。它是什么？祭司们宣称这是你被选中来完成使命的标志。你是接受这个命运，并发誓要完成它，还是决心看到它破灭？有什么力量在反对你？

Mysticism.name: 神秘
Mysticism.option1: 有些人仍然在古道中寻求安慰。他们唤来秘术师为其占卜他们新生儿的命运，或请他们举行仪式以祈求丰收。其他人则出于对那些被怀疑掌握巫术之人的恐惧而获得行动。然而，大多数人认为真正的魔法即使存在，现在也已经被我们所遗忘。
Mysticism.quest1: 你身边的人被指控诅咒一个村子，他让田地休耕，牛群生病。这背后有什么证据呢？你会为这个人辩护，并揭开这个定居点麻烦的真正原因吗？
Mysticism.option2: 魔法是罕见的，也是危险的，但那些拥有这种力量的少数人是真正的天才。
Mysticism.quest2: 你听说过一个拥有真正力量的人的故事。他们住在遥远的与世隔绝的村落里。是谁告诉你这个秘术师的？他们是被恐惧还是被尊重？你为什么发誓要寻找他们？
Mysticism.option3: 魔法在这片土地上流淌，如同河流在山间流淌。对于那些选择利用它的人来说，力量就在那里，甚至普通人也经常知道一两个有用的魔法仪式。
Mysticism.quest3: 你所爱的人走在追求力量的道路上，并屈服于它。他们是谁？他们为什么会坠入黑暗？他们现在在哪里？你是想拯救他们还是打败他们？

Beasts.name: 怪物
Beasts.option1: 古老的野兽不过是传说。少数进入深山老林和群山之中的人带回了关于畸形生物的疯狂传说，但他们显然是在妄想。这样的东西并不存在。
Beasts.quest1: 你目击了一次被你认定是畸形怪物的袭击。但没有人相信你。事实上，你被指控将谋杀案归咎于这只野兽。你怎样才能证明自己的清白？你可以相信自己对场袭击的记忆吗？
Beasts.option2: 怪物般的怪兽在铁原的荒野地区徘徊。
Beasts.quest2: 一个杰出的铁民满心想要对一只特定的野兽发起复仇。是什么让这只生物与众不同？它怎样招致这位铁民的愤怒？你是要帮助这个人完成其目标，还是获得行动阻止他们盲目的仇恨招来更多的杀戮？
Beasts.option3: 各种各样的野兽在铁原游荡。它们主要居住在上游地区，但也会到定居的土地上狩猎。在那里，它们经常捕食牛群，但对旅行者、商队、甚至定居点的攻击也并不罕见。
Beasts.quest3: 职业的猎人通过杀戮野兽过活。这个特别的猎人因其无数次的猎杀而闻名于整个铁原，但她在一次狩猎中失踪了。是她终于遇到了对手，还是有什么更邪恶的东西在作祟。你和她又有什么关系？
